about_the_game:
About this content

This background is suitable for RPGs, visual novel games and more! It is perfect for portraying traditional Japanese Historical scenes.
There are time difference variations for day, evening, night, and night (with lights).
These pictures will come in handy for adding further atmosphere and also would be easy to show the flow of time in your storytelling!

*******************************************
Pictures:40 (816x624, 1280x720)
*******************************************
